Summary: Red center orange large sphere moved S to N same speed
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Kasson
There were no other sightings in Kasson on or around July 4th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsNoticed it outside my window. ran out to observe. It moved in a slow speed with change in color or height. Traveled from S to N in a straight line. No sound no remnants in path.
